ygData.subject: Hunting at lvl 16
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Ok, beaten to death question, but I ll ask anyways. Where will I gain good xp at lvl 16?  I have been hanging out in the East Karana s and North
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

Ok, beaten to death question, but I'll ask anyways.

Where will I gain good xp at lvl 16? I have been hanging out in the East
Karana's and North Karana's lately. I used to hunt Befallen, but find that
I am probably too strong for the 2nd level and too weak for the 3rd. West
commons doesn't have much, and Beholder is now a limbo zone (lots of low
blues, and hi reds).

I am interested in xp, but am concerned I am not making enough money, so
some good xp/loot combo areas would be good. I must admit, i haven't
explored much beyond the West commons or the Karanas.

Brytewing, 16th level, the rathe.
